page.title: 02SCHOOLS IN HORLEY
page.content: Horley has two comprehensive {schools}for children aged 12-18, three middle schools, Yattendon, Court Lodge and Meath Green and four first schools one of which is still being built. Children from Burstow First and Middle School attend the two comprehensives. There are schools for children with special educational needs in the area. Because of new housing developments in many parts of the town the over all number of children is increasing due to the situation of the new houses. Many of the children will go to the existing first school, and will go to the new first school when it is finished. Both schools will send their children on to Yattendon. At present there are 301 children at Yattendon. This number is much lower than it has been and is due to rise again.
